trans-unit.source: Represents an event that an instance store raises to notify generic hosts about the existence of activatable instances in the persistence database.
trans-unit.target: 表示实例存储区引发的用于通知泛型主机存在持久性数据库中的可激活实例的有关的事件。

trans-unit.source: An instance is *activatable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions: - The instance is *runnable*.
trans-unit.target: 实例是*可激活*，如果它未处于挂起的状态或完成的状态并且满足以下条件:-的实例是*可运行*。

trans-unit.source: An instance in the persistence database is considered as runnable if it satisfies the following conditions: - The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired.
trans-unit.target: 持久性数据库中的实例被视为可为运行，如果它满足以下条件:-实例处于解除锁定状态，并且具有已过期的挂起计时器。

trans-unit.source: - The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**.
trans-unit.target: 的实例处于解除锁定状态，并且其状态为**执行**。

trans-unit.source: - The instance has an invalid lock on it.
trans-unit.target: 实例已在其上的锁无效。

trans-unit.source: - There is no workflow host capable of loading the instance is running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: -没有工作流主机能够加载在计算机运行的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance store should periodically search for activatable workflow instances that belong to a workflow host that uses the store.
trans-unit.target: 实例存储应定期搜索属于使用该存储的工作流主机可激活工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: It should raise the HasActivatableWorkflowEvent when it finds an activatable instance in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 在持久性存储区中找到可激活实例时，它应引发 HasActivatableWorkflowEvent。

trans-unit.source: If the instance store does not find an activatable instance in the persistence store, it should continue to monitor the persistence store for any activatable instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例存储在持久性存储区中未找到可激活实例，它应继续监视持久性存储区的任何可激活的实例。

trans-unit.source: After raising the HasActivatableWorkflowEvent, the instance store should stop monitoring the persistence store for activatable instances until it receives and executes the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 引发 HasActivatableWorkflowEvent 之后，实例存储应停止监视持久性存储区可激活实例，直至它收到并执行<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand>.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand>为止

trans-unit.source: The monitoring continues only if the command execution does not return any activatable workflow instances.
trans-unit.target: 监视只有会继续如果命令执行未返回任何可激活工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: When a generic host receives this event, it executes the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand> against the instance store to obtain activation parameters required to create a workflow host.
trans-unit.target: 当泛型宿主收到此事件时，它会执行<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand>针对实例存储，以获取创建工作流主机所需的激活参数。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.QueryActivatableWorkflowsCommand>

trans-unit.source: The generic host uses these activation parameters to create a workflow host, which in turn loads and runs the service instance.
trans-unit.target: 泛型宿主使用这些激活参数来创建工作流宿主，后者又依次加载并运行服务实例。

trans-unit.source: The activation parameters for the WAS activation type are: Site Name, Application Path (relative to the site), and Service Path (relative to the application).
trans-unit.target: WAS 激活类型的激活参数包括︰ 站点名称、 应用程序路径 （相对于站点） 和服务路径 （相对于应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: An instance store could return multiple sets of these three activation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 实例存储区可能返回多组这三个激活参数。

trans-unit.source: A generic host is a host that has an XName parameter named **ActivationType**, which should be set to a value supported by the instance store.
trans-unit.target: 泛型宿主是具有 XName 参数名为的主机**ActivationType**，其应设置为实例存储支持的值。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the SQL Workflow Instance Store supports generic hosts with ActivationType parameter set to value: **WAS**.
trans-unit.target: 目前，SQL 工作流实例存储支持泛型主机支持 ActivationType 参数设置为值︰ **WAS**。

trans-unit.source: If the ActivationType is not set at all, the SQL Workflow Instance Store treats the host as a generic host.
trans-unit.target: 如果根本未设置 ActivationType，则 SQL 工作流实例存储将宿主视为泛型宿主。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Workflow Management Service that ships with the code named “Dublin” (Application Server Extensions for .NET 4.0) is a generic host that has the activation type set to **WAS**.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 附带了代码名为"Dublin"（.NET 4.0 的应用程序服务器扩展） 的工作流管理服务是将激活类型设置为一个泛型主机**WAS**。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasActivatableWorkflowEvent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasActivatableWorkflowEvent"></xref>类。
